# Log in Page

<h2>Sign In</h2>

<label for="email">Email:</label>
<input type="email" id="email" required><br>

<label for="password">Password:</label>
<input type="password" id="password" required><br>

<button onclick="checkLogin()">Login</button>

<script>
// Simple email and password storage
const users = {
  "kgroe@iastate.edu": {
    password: "kgroe", 
    page: "Modules.html"
  },
  "rhuffman@iastate.edu": {
    password: "rhuffman", 
    page: "rhuffman.html"
  }
};

// Function to check login
function checkLogin() {
  var email = document.getElementById("email").value.trim().toLowerCase();
  var password = document.getElementById("password").value.trim();

  if (users[email] && users[email].password === password) {
    sessionStorage.setItem("access", email); // Store email in session
    window.location.href = users[email].page; // Redirect user
  } else {
    alert("Incorrect email or password.");
  }
}

// Function to check session expiration and redirect if needed
window.onload = function() {
  var email = sessionStorage.getItem("access");
  var currentPage = window.location.pathname.split("/").pop().toLowerCase();

  // Prevent redirect loop by checking if already on login page
  if (!email && currentPage !== "login.html") {
    window.location.href = "login.html";
  }
};
</script>
